file.name: expected_recursive_coproducts.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Entities
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /:
    post:
      operationId: postRoot
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Clause'
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
        '400':
          description: 'Invalid value for: body'
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
components:
  schemas:
    Clause:
      oneOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Expression'
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Not'
    Expression:
      required:
        - v
      type: object
      properties:
        v:
          type: string
    Not:
      required:
        - not
      type: object
      properties:
        not:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Clause'

Error: parse: paths: /: post: operation "postRoot": requestBody: content: "application/json": parse schema: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/Clause": parse schema: oneOf: [1]: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/Not": parse schema: not: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/Clause": infinite recursion: "#/components/schemas/Clause"
